edited_stories.edited_story_text: I had an amazing time at the last baseball game. The players were focused and sharp, making plays and out playing the other team with their sheer amount of talent. No knock against the opposing team either. Both teams played an exceptionally good and close game. But, I think what made the difference were the cheerleaders, which displayed a tremendous amount of skill and moral support.
